Title: A non-geometric representation of the Dirac equation in curved spacetime
Source: Marcel Grossman Meet. Recent Dev. Theor. Exp. General Relativ., Astrophys. Relativ. Field Theor., Proc.
Abstract: Copyright © 2018 by the Editors.All rights reserved.We write the Dirac equation in curved 4-dimensional Lorentzian spacetime using concepts from the analysis of partial differential equations as opposed to geometric concepts.
